name: QCCompositionPickerView
desc: The QCCompositionPickerView class allows users to browse compositions that are in the Quartz Composer composition repository, and to preview them. You can set the default input parameters for a composition preview  by using the method setDefaultValue:forInputKey:.

items.name: func setBackgroundColor(NSColor!)
items.desc: Sets the background color for the composition picker view.

items.name: func backgroundColor() -> NSColor!
items.desc: Returns the background color of the composition picker view.

items.name: func setDrawsBackground(Bool)
items.desc: Sets whether the composition picker view draws its background.

items.name: func drawsBackground() -> Bool
items.desc: Returns whether the composition picker view draws its background.

items.name: func setDefaultValue(Any!, forInputKey: String!)
items.desc: Sets the default value to use for a composition input parameter.

items.name: func resetDefaultInputValues()
items.desc: Clears all previously set default values for composition input parameters.

items.name: func startAnimation(Any!)
items.desc: Starts animating the composition in the composition picker view.

items.name: func stopAnimation(Any!)
items.desc: Stops animating the composition that is currently animating in the composition picker view.

items.name: func isAnimating() -> Bool
items.desc: Returns whether or not the composition picker view is currently animating its composition.

items.name: func setMaxAnimationFrameRate(Float)
items.desc: Sets the maximum frame rate for animating compositions.

items.name: func maxAnimationFrameRate() -> Float
items.desc: Retrieves the maximum frame rate for animating compositions.

items.name: func setShowsCompositionNames(Bool)
items.desc: Enables the display of composition names in the composition picker view.

items.name: func showsCompositionNames() -> Bool
items.desc: Retrieves whether composition names can be shown in the composition picker view.

items.name: func setDelegate(Any!)
items.desc: Sets the composition picker view delegate.

items.name: func delegate() -> Any!
items.desc: Retrieves the composition picker view delegate.

items.name: func setCompositionsFromRepositoryWithProtocol(String!, andAttributes: [AnyHashable : Any]!)
items.desc: Sets the compositions in the composition picker view to those that match the specified criteria.

items.name: func compositions() -> [Any]!
items.desc: Returns the list of compositions that are currently in the composition picker view.

items.name: func setAllowsEmptySelection(Bool)
items.desc: Sets whether to allow an empty selection in the composition picker view.

items.name: func allowsEmptySelection() -> Bool
items.desc: Retrieves the empty-selection state of the composition picker view.

items.name: func setCompositionAspectRatio(NSSize)
items.desc: Sets the aspect ratio used to display compositions in the composition picker view.

items.name: func compositionAspectRatio() -> NSSize
items.desc: Retrieves the aspect ratio used to display compositions in the composition picker view.

items.name: func setSelectedComposition(QCComposition!)
items.desc: Sets a composition as selected in the composition picker view.

items.name: func selectedComposition() -> QCComposition!
items.desc: Returns the composition that is currently selected in the composition picker view.

items.name: func setNumberOfColumns(Int)
items.desc: Sets the number of columns in the composition picker view.

items.name: func numberOfColumns() -> Int
items.desc: Retrieves the number of columns in the composition picker view.

items.name: func setNumberOfRows(Int)
items.desc: Sets the number of rows in the composition picker view.

items.name: func numberOfRows() -> Int
items.desc: Retrieves the number of rows in the composition picker view.

items.name: static let QCCompositionPickerViewDidSelectComposition: NSNotification.Name
items.desc: Posted when the user selects a composition in the picker view.
